author: edgeofhearing
title: Good first build
review:
I just sat down with this set and my 4 year old daughter, figuring I'd start showing her the basics of how to find the pieces you want. You know, things like "can you find me a piece that is two on one side, three on the other, and is blue?", then just show her where to put them. Well, halfway through the build, she starts getting ahead of me. For the rest of the build, I just let her follow the template - I have never been so proud. As I write this, she it taking it apart with a brick separator, and sorting by piece, so that she can build it again.

Bottom line, this was a fantastic first set, and should be pretty easy to recreate without the official set just with parts from most random collections. I'd love to see more sets like this one.

author: captainamerica1
title: Great set, need more promos like this one!
review: Found out this was free at Toys R Us for a limited time a few years ago. Good value, simple build, no money spent. Pretty hard to find it now, but thankfully it isn't hard to build. (Use the template).
